General.Name: Suncha Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Suncha Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, design, production, and sales of daily kitchen utensils in China. It offers antibacterial alloy chopsticks, whole bamboo and wood cutting boards, wheat silver ion antibacterial cutting boards, EBM rice husk children's tableware, and other products. Suncha Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

4.Name: Mr. Chaozhen  Li
4.Title: Deputy Gen. Mang., Director and Financial Controller
